weapon_description: An ancient longbow crested with red feathers, a sacred relic of the Flower-Feather Clan that has been passed down from generation to generation.
weapon_skill_description: For 12s after triggering a Swirl reaction, ATK increases by 48%. In addition, when 1/2 or more characters in the party are of a different Elemental Type from the equipping character, the DMG dealt by the equipping character's Charged Attacks is increased by 40%/96% and Elemental Burst DMG dealt is increased by 20%/48%.
